title: BRIEF-Rossell India Shuts Down Hospitality Division
text:
BRIEF-Rossell India Shuts Down Hospitality Division

Stock Markets 33 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 16:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Rossell India Shuts Down Hospitality Division Oct 3 (Reuters) - Rossell India Ltd : * ALL OUTLETS OF "KEBAB XPRESS" AT NCR DELHI FORMING PART OF ROSSELL HOSPITALITY DIVISION, HAVE BEEN SHUT DOWN * ROSSELL INDIA - ROSSELL HOSPITALITY DIVISION HAS NO BUSINESS OPERATIONS FROM OCT 1, AND IS IN PROCESS OF CLOSURE ON OR BEFORE DEC 31

BRIEF-Rossell India Shuts Down Hospitality Division
description: BRIEF-Rossell India Shuts Down Hospitality Division
